txt.en: An Orc has killed the dog and taken Sperling's sword
This Orc appears to have been mauled by a drake...
This Orc did not have Sperling's sword

The dog which absconded with Sperling's sword was slain by a mounted Orc... there is no sign of the toy weapon near the corpse, suggesting that the Orc may have taken it. Tracks move away to the north-west.
You found a small fragment of the toy sword

The dog which absconded with Sperling's sword was slain by a mounted Orc... there is no sign of the toy weapon near the corpse, suggesting that the Orc may have taken it. Tracks move away to the north-west.\n\nYou should hunt mounted Orcs until you find it.
Mounted Orcs can be found throughout the Entwash Vale.\n\nYou should hunt mounted Orcs until you find the one that has Sperling's sword.
Mounted Orcs can be found throughout the Entwash Vale. Tracks move away to the east.\n\nYou should hunt mounted Orcs until you find the one that has Sperling's sword.
You should search the corpse of the drake-slain Orc for Sperling's sword.
Find the Orc that has Sperling's sword
Find the Orc that has Sperling's sword
Search the corpse of the drake-slain Orc
